pages.title: about
pages.text: DanielHe, a fifteen-year-old handsome boy from Quzhou, Zhejiang, China, is now studying in Wenyuan Secondary School, Xuejun Senior High School. Loves creating, programming, gaming, … Haven’t married yet. Haven’t got any gf, and is needing. Contact me at hechenyu666@gmail.com or 2908172388@qq.com.

posts.title: “打炮”
posts.excerpt: *注意此处“打炮”指一手势游戏。 引入在我们每一天都日复一日的枯乏无味的学习生活之中，有这么一群人。他们不满足于40分钟的摸鱼上课，10分钟的厕所闲聊，在百无聊赖之中，灵光一现（其实也是继承了上一届的优良传统），发明了这样一种令人激动、热血沸腾的对战手势游戏。
posts.text: *注意此处“打炮”指一手势游戏。 引入在我们每一天都日复一日的枯乏无味的学习生活之中，有这么一群人。他们不满足于40分钟的摸鱼上课，10分钟的厕所闲聊，在百无聊赖之中，灵光一现（其实也是继承了上一届的优良传统），发明了这样一种令人激动、热血沸腾的对战手势游戏。 介绍发明者笔者本人不详，希望其人见本博客后速速联系（2908172388@qq.com) 一说DTY 玩法（笔者目前了解的版本） 一、远古版本叫法简称老版，也称极简版、原始版等。 手势（注：每个玩家各有喜好，此处介绍也限于笔者水平可能会出现谬误，敬请读者谅解与指出，2908172388@qq.com) 1.攒费右手拳状，掌心面左，向下击打一次为装弹一发。 2.射击手枪手势，原位伸出手指（不需要向前伸出手，不然不礼貌主要是被你打死的话会觉得你很不爽），按食指、中指、无名指的顺序，出几枪伸几根手指即可。 3.防弹右手拳状，掌心向下紧贴支撑物（如左手手掌） 4.反弹右手四指伸直与手掌向内折叠近90°，大拇指随意（没有听说过有什么要求） 5.爪右手五指弯曲伸开高举（顾名思义即可，玩家可自行琢磨） 6.防爪右手拳状略松，掌心向上 编程实现其实做一个会“打炮”的AI不难，毕竟电脑叫就叫计算机，用电脑来实现所有的枚举计算那是再合适不过了。 起名为方便VS编译，本程序采用英文命名，暂时命名为SmartShooting0.1 算法思想本AI应用于计算机与单人单机玩家的对战。在每个回合开始决定时，先获取敌我双方（此处叙述玩家为敌，AI为我）的子弹数量，再根据子弹数量穷举所有可以（注意不是可能，而是所有可以发生的情况，无论多么离谱）发生的情况，不断穷举下去，直到达到计算深度或有人死亡后停止所有计算，并获得枚举结果，计算出当前回合出什么手势的获胜概率最大与死亡概率最小。参照此种算法，每个回合计算一遍，***你有信心战胜AI吗？欢迎来战！*** 语言因为本人对MFC中的C++更有经验，所以本程序采用中文（哈哈啊哈） 代码实现变量定义12int your_bulletnumber=0,computer_bulletnumber=0;//双方初始子弹数量为0bool your_skillability[6]={0},computer_skillability[6]={0};//用于判定子弹数是否足够的结果，0表示不能，1表示能 主函数判定玩家子弹数是否足够12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364switch(your_bulletnumber) { case 0:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=0; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=0; your_skillability[4]=0; your_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 1:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=0; your_skillability[4]=0; your_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 2:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=0; your_skillability[4]=0; your_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 3:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=0; your_skillability[4]=0; your_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 4:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=1; your_skillability[4]=0; your_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 5:{ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=1; your_skillability[4]=1; your_skillability[5]=1; break; }}if (your_bulletnumber>5){ your_skillability[0]=1; your_skillability[1]=1; your_skillability[2]=1; your_skillability[3]=1; your_skillability[4]=1; your_skillability[5]=1;} 判定AI子弹数是否足够12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364switch(computer_bulletnumber) { case 0:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=0; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=0; computer_skillability[4]=0; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 1:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=0; computer_skillability[4]=0; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 2:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=0; computer_skillability[4]=0; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 3:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=0; computer_skillability[4]=0; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 4:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=1; computer_skillability[4]=0; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; } case 5:{ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=1; computer_skillability[4]=1; computer_skillability[5]=1; break; }}if (computer_bulletnumber>5){ computer_skillability[0]=1; computer_skillability[1]=1; computer_skillability[2]=1; computer_skillability[3]=1; computer_skillability[4]=1; computer_skillability[5]=1;} AI算法部分让我肝一肝
posts.author: Daniel He

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
